item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 30, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. US tells European companies to comply with Trump’s anti-diversity order
2. Norway urged to drop ‘crazy’ ban on investment in defence companies
3. [Opinion] The deep eccentricity of Donald Trump
4. [Opinion] The great European disentanglement from US stocks has only just started
5. Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence group buys X for $45bn
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, March 30, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
